# echohello.dev

> Portfolio and project showcase for echohello-dev. Features terminal-inspired design, developer tooling projects, and software consulting services.

echohello.dev is a statically-generated Next.js portfolio site showcasing:
- Open-source developer tools and infrastructure projects
- Software consulting and development services
- Technical blog posts and project documentation

Built with Next.js 16 (static export), Contentlayer2 for MDX content management, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with a terminal aesthetic theme.

## Pages

- [About](https://echohello.dev/about/): Learn more about echoHello
- [Open Source](https://echohello.dev/oss/): Our open source contributions and projects
- [Projects](https://echohello.dev/projects/): Browse our portfolio of projects
- [Services](https://echohello.dev/services/): Our services and offerings

## Featured Projects

- [Backstage](https://github.com/echohello-dev/backstage): A production-ready Backstage in a showcase emphasizing developer portal capabilities and enterprise features.
- [Website](https://echohello.dev): The website for echoHello
- [Betterfit](https://github.com/echohello-dev/betterfit): A workout tracker with auto-tracking capability
- [Yell](https://github.com/echohello-dev/yell): A Kahoot / Menti alternative to live quizzes with a spin!
- [Wingman](https://github.com/echohello-dev/wingman): A Slackbot that can help enhance your channel
- [Transcribe Me](https://github.com/echohello-dev/transcribe-yt): The transcriber that uses Anthropic and OpenAI.

## Developer Documentation

- [AI Agent Guide](https://echohello.dev/AGENTS.md): Comprehensive development guide with architecture patterns, content pipeline, workflows, and design system
- [README](https://echohello.dev/README.md): Quick start guide with setup instructions and development commands
- [Contentlayer Config](https://github.com/echohello-dev/website/blob/main/contentlayer.config.ts): Content schema definitions for Projects and Pages document types

## Technical Stack

- [Next.js 16](https://nextjs.org/): App Router with static site generation
- [Contentlayer2](https://github.com/contentlayerdev/contentlayer): MDX content compilation with TypeScript type generation
- [Tailwind CSS 4](https://tailwindcss.com/): Utility-first CSS with custom theming via CSS variables
- [next-themes](https://github.com/pacocoursey/next-themes): Dark/light mode with system preference support

## Optional

- [Package.json](https://github.com/echohello-dev/website/blob/main/package.json): Full dependency list and build scripts
- [TypeScript Config](https://github.com/echohello-dev/website/blob/main/tsconfig.json): Strict mode TypeScript configuration
- [ESLint Config](https://github.com/echohello-dev/website/blob/main/eslint.config.mjs): Flat config with Next.js and Prettier rules
- [Next.js Config](https://github.com/echohello-dev/website/blob/main/next.config.ts): Static export with Contentlayer integration
